text: why/how can we get the same quality of colors after recording, the colors in the Makie window look so much nicer than the final result in the video.

elements.text: why/how can we get the same quality of colors after recording, the colors in the Makie window look so much nicer than the final result in the video.

text: Try adjusting `compression` (0 is lossless, 51 is max)
Could also be a color space issue if you have a high gamut monitor

elements.text: Could also be a color space issue if you have a high gamut monitor

text: Because the Makie window is probably not color managed but the video player might be, causing more saturated colors in the Makie window
